fields.description:
Name: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException Reason: No drawer view found with gravity LEFT
Namejava.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Reason
No drawer view found with gravity LEFT

Latest Version
3.0.6.1

Crashed Thread

0	java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: No drawer view found with gravity LEFT
!	1	at android.support.v4.widget.DrawerLayout.openDrawer(DrawerLayout.java:1464)
2	at com.tripvi.drawerlayout.Drawer.openLeftDrawer(Drawer.java:178)
3	at com.tripvi.drawerlayout.Drawer.toggleLeftDrawer(Drawer.java:173)
4	at com.tripvi.drawerlayout.DrawerProxy.handleToggleLeftView(DrawerProxy.java:82)
5	at com.tripvi.drawerlayout.DrawerProxy.handleMessage(DrawerProxy.java:48)
6	at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:98)
7	at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:148)
8	at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:5466)
9	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
10	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:726)
11	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:616)

Appcelerator version 4.5
Titanium SDK : 5.2.2
Android API version : 23
dk.napp.drawer version 1.1.7 (android)

comments.body:
Hello,
Thanks for reporting . The module you used (NappDrawer) is a third party module.  Appcelerator does not give support for this module. Please contact the author of this module directly. 
Thanks
